name: GenderTrix
description:
Basic geometrical pieces represents our biological gender, but inside of us there is our real gender, feelings and how we love.

 This is just a game for fun. It don't pretend to be a real reflection of all gender people options.

Try to match all pieces with love or sexual attraction.
Discover their feelings.

Use mouse to move pieces or change how to match pieces[Love/Sex](Right button) and to match pieces(Left Button).
ESC key to exit. :-)
